title: Slow Cooker Venison Roast Recipe
description: This venison roast crockpot dinner couldn't be easier: Venison, onion, and 2 soup mixes simmer in the slow cooker for a creamy, tender, delectable meal.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Meat and Poultry Game Meats Venison Slow Cooker Venison Roast 4.5 (443) 362 Reviews 36 Photos A venison roast crockpot dinner, slow cooked with onion, creamy mushroom soup, a dab of this and a spice of that. It's a simple, tasty way to enjoy game meat. Submitted by Sara Updated on March 11, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 36 36 36 36 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 6 hrs Total Time: 6 hrs 10 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 3 pounds boneless venison roast 1 large onion, sliced 1 tablespoon soy sauce 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce 1 tablespoon garlic salt ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Clean venison roast and place in a slow cooker. Cover with onion slices, then sprinkle with soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce, garlic salt, and pepper. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir onion soup mix and condensed soup together in a small bowl. Pour mixture over venison. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cover and cook on Low setting for 6 hours. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Serve and enjoy! Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 751 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 314 Calories 8g Fat 10g Carbs 48g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 6 Calories 314 % Daily Value * Total Fat 8g 10% Saturated Fat 3g 13% Cholesterol 171mg 57% Sodium 1882mg 82% Total Carbohydrate 10g 4% Dietary Fiber 1g 3% Total Sugars 3g Protein 48g 96% Vitamin C 2mg 2% Calcium 35mg 3% Iron 8mg 43% Potassium 460mg 10% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Slow Cooker Venison Roast 01 of 36 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 36 Photo by  FeistyBean6994 12/10/2023 This is a simple, tasty and quick venison roast recipe that will make a believer out of those who find venison too gamy. I place the roast on top of potato wedges and sliced carrot along with 1cup of water in the slow cooker to make the meal more complete. I did not use garlic salt since the onion soup provides enough salt. Instead I used two large, minced garlic cloves. We have made this many times now and it is a reliable recipe. 03 of 36 Photo by  Nicki H 01/18/2021 04 of 36 Photo by  Ruth 11/05/2020 05 of 36 Photo by  Krzysztof Kus 11/01/2020 06 of 36 Photo by  sonia 12/19/2019 07 of 36 Photo by  Bill Yandow 09/29/2019 08 of 36 Photo by  Jeff Grasto 03/17/2019 I made this yesterday, loved it. My wife and youngest though felt it was very similar to a beef roast......I disagree :) 09 of 36 Photo by  Ludmilla Stewart 02/19/2019 10 of 36 Photo by  snsweetiey 11/07/2018 Not bad. Went off everyone’s suggestions about the salt. Used garlic powder, a splash of soy sauce, mixed water into the soups and cubes up potatoes and threw around the roast while it cooked. It definitely did not have a strong salt flavor. However, the sauce did not go well with the venison roast but it didn’t make the potatoes taste good. 1 2 3 4 Next You’ll Also Love Cracked Black Venison 11 Ratings Venison Tips and Rice 53 Ratings From-Scratch Venison Stroganoff 13 Ratings Venison Schnitzel 57 Ratings Venison Kabobs with Sweet and Smoky Sauce 8 Ratings Hunter's Venison Casserole 33 Ratings Scott Ure's Clams and Garlic 442 Ratings Steve's Bodacious Barbecue Ribs 32 Ratings Bone-In Ham Cooked in Beer 131 Ratings Hunter's Roast 27 Ratings Slow Cooker Venison Sloppy Joes 96 Ratings The Humble Shepherd 156 Ratings Roast Leg of Lamb with Rosemary 733 Ratings Venison with Sherry-Mushroom Sauce 52 Ratings Wisconsin Bratwurst 454 Ratings Jo's Mountain Mush 11 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
